entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:03 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
